entry.title: Elevate 38 Sports Turf for Batting Cages (5mm Pad)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Athletic Textiles
Type:
Price: 2.69

Artificial Turf Description

Kodiak Elevate 38 sports turf with 5mm foam pad is made for batting cages and moderate traffic areas and continues to deliver a long term returns on investment at a moderate price point. It provides an excellent feel, durable 1/2" pile height and spring set yarn delivers traffic pattern resistance.

The foam backing offers additional padding and extends the life of the sports turf; as well as provides impact resistance for plyometric activities.

How to Order
  • Buy Pre-Cut Sizes online, Request a Quote for custom lengths, or call to place your order with a sales person
  • Synthetic Turf is priced by the square foot
  • Kodiak Elevate 38 rolls are 12' in width and cut to incrementally in length to the nearest foot, but can be custom made in 15' with minimum order requirements.
  • Minimum Order: 20' length (Shorter orders will not be accepted without calling in for authorization)
    Installation Options

    Kodiak Sports Installs Nationwide or we provide material for DIY

    Installation options

    • Full glue down
    • Seam only glue down
    • Seam only glue/seam tape
    • Factory Velcro seams
    Shipping Time

     

    Please allow 2.5 weeks for delivery to most areas of the lower 48 states.

entry.title: 10/20 Mesh Ambient Rubber Infill - 2200 lbs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Athletic Textiles
Type:
Price: 499.99

Rubber Infill

Recycled rubber infill is commonly used rubber infill for synthetic turf fields, sports complexes and playgrounds; it can be used for indoor and outdoor facilities.

The ambient rubber infill is cleaned and washed, made of 100% recycled tires, and 99.9999% free of metal and other contaminants. 

Typically quoted with sports turf applications.

Available in bulk (2200 lb) bags.

entry.title: Pro Football & Soccer Athletic Field Turf FL53
entry.summary:
Vendor: Athletic Textiles
Type:
Price: 2.89 - 3.29 (9 variants)

Artificial Field Turf Description

The pro FL53 is hands down the most popular grass infill style sports turf in the USA. The FL53 slit filament yarn is the most durable style of and is the only yarn that will withstand the wear and tear of directional change in high traffic of indoor sports like football, lacrosse, and soccer.

Interestingly, the FL53 is the most affordable AND the most durable yarn. It's easy to see why it is such a popular choice and offers a great return on your investment.

The standard FL53 is 42 ounces, but can be custom manufactured at higher face weights and longer pile height in order to extend the life and add to the performance of large projects.

The FL53 also works very well as a playground product as it will accept up to three pounds of rubber per square foot and meets ASTM fall height requirements up to ten feet.

Ordering Specifications:

  • Synthetic Turf is priced by the square foot
  • Turf Rolls are 15' wide and cut incrementally to the nearest foot
  • Minimum Order: 10,000 square feet (Shorter orders will not be accepted)

entry.title: Mono/Slit Filament Baseball Field Turf KS_FL416
entry.summary:
Vendor: Athletic Textiles
Type:
Price: 3.09 - 3.49 (2 variants)

Artificial Field Turf Description

The FL416 is a high performance blend of slit filament and mono filament yarns specifically for baseball fields.  The heavy thatch keeps the sand/rubber infill mix down in the turf; while providing a true and realistic bounce during game play.

The slit filament yarn adds durability for high traffic sports like football, lacrosse, and soccer and the Mono-filament yarn creates a softer, plush-like look and feel.

The stock FL416 is a 65 ounce product but can be custom manufactured at a higher face weight and longer pile height in order to extend the life and add to the performance of large projects.

The FL416 can be used with rubber/sand mix for a more realistic bounce, or rubber only infill system.


Ordering Specifications:

  • Synthetic Turf is priced by the square foot
  • Turf Rolls are 15' wide and cut incrementally to the nearest foot
  • Minimum Order: 10,000 square feet (Smaller orders will not be accepted)

entry.title: Mono/Slit Filament Athletic Field Turf KS_FL410
entry.summary:
Vendor: Athletic Textiles
Type:
Price: 2.89

Artificial Field Turf Description

The FL410 is a high performance blend of slit filament and mono-filament yarns to create a plush, pro-level athletic turf surface. The slit filament yarn adds durability for high traffic sports like football, lacrosse, and soccer and the Mono-filament yarn creates a softer, plush-like look and feel. This combination is unmatched in providing the necessary durability and great feel for a high end indoor or outdoor sports field.

The stock FL410 is a 50 ounce product but can be custom manufactured at a higher face weight and longer pile height in order to extend the life and add to the performance of large projects.

The FL410 also works very well as a playground product as it will accept up to three pounds of rubber per square foot and meets ASTM fall height requirements up to ten feet.

Ordering Specifications:

  • Synthetic Turf is priced by the square foot
  • Turf Rolls are 15' wide and cut incrementally to the nearest foot
  • Minimum Order: 10,000 square feet (Shorter orders will not be accepted)

entry.title: Hybrid Performance Sports Turf (5mm Pad) - KS48MF-5mm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Athletic Textiles
Type:
Price: 4.09

Artificial Turf Description

Kodiak Sports manufactures a set of special hybrid sports turfs that combine nylon and polyethylene fibers for an unbeatable combo of durability and softness. Durability and softness are not capable of being combined at cheaper fiber levels; typically a soft turf fiber is going to show a lot of traffic patterns.

The KS48MF is ultra soft blend of PolyE yarns. A perfect fit for fitness centers with a lot of ground work.

Our hybrid athletic turfs are perfect for clients looking for softer feel that is very durable in an advanced performance environment involving extensive ground work and traffic. The 48 ounce hybrid athletic turf is designed for moderate traffic areas including speed/agility training, cross fit, yoga, and more.  The KS48MF is very popular in the fitness industry.

These products are designated with the KS740MF, KS48MF, KS755MF, KS755EMF product designations.

The KS48MF-5mm is the high middle tier of the hybrid sports turf offered at an excellent price point with solid resistance to traffic patterns and abrasion. It is the most versatile turf and can be used for almost any indoor sports facility training.

How to Order
  • Buy online, Request a Quote, or call to place your order with a sales person
  • Synthetic Turf is priced by the square foot
  • The KS48MF Turf Rolls are 15' in width and cut to incrementally in length to the nearest foot
  • Minimum Order: 20' length (Shorter orders will not be accepted without calling in for authorization)
    Installation Options

    Kodiak Sports Installs Nationwide or we provide material for DIY

    Installation options

    • Full glue down
    • Seam only glue down
    • Seam only glue/seam tape
    • Factory Velcro seams
    Shipping Time

    The KS48MF hybrid sports turf is one of our most popular items and is produced weekly. 

    Single and smaller roll orders can ship with in 3 days.

    Small orders of 2000-6000 sq. ft. will typically ship within 7-9 days

    Please allow 2.5 - 3 weeks for delivery of larger orders.

entry.title: 328' Roll of Seam Tape for Artificial Turf
entry.summary:
Vendor: Athletic Textiles
Type:
Price: 229.99

Turf Seam Tape Description

The artificial turf seaming tape is one foot in width and is designed for use with artificial turf in sports and landscaping.

The roll of turf seam tape is 328 linear ft and is 1' wide (12 inches).

Turf seam tape is a "cold seam"...no seaming iron necessary.

The seam tape requires glue/adhesive to function; there is no peel and stick or "built in" adhesive.  This is a strong fabric seam tape for use with turf adhesive.  Adhesive ought to be applied to the dull side of the tape.

entry.summary:

Artificial Turf Description

The Super Collegiate sports turf is a beefed up version of our most popular collegiate turf.  The mono-filament athletic turfs are a top seller and include the KS42PVBM-1mm Super Collegiate Xtreme All Weather Sports Turf.

The 42 ounce mono-filament athletic turf is designed for moderate to high traffic areas such as batting cages, indoor sports training facilities, athletic centers, and more. Performs very well outdoors and in wet climates without a foam pad. The 1mm rubber backing offers a some cushion and requires glue down over concrete in most cases.

It is a top seller and still delivers long term returns on your investment at an excellent price point. Designed for high traffic areas, it offers good resistance to traffic patterns and abrasion, and can be used for multiple sports.

entry.title: 52oz Nylon Sports Turf (5mm Pad) - KS52N-5mm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Athletic Textiles
Type:
Price: 4.89

Artificial Turf Description

Kodiak Sports manufacturers a full line of nylon sports turfs in 25oz, 35oz and 52oz face weights.. 

The 52 ounce nylon sports turf is designed for high traffic walking areas, putting greens, speed & agility centers/sprint lanes, batting cages, indoor baseball academies and more.

The KS52N-5mm is a monofilament nylon sports turf designed for excellent resistance to traffic patterns, abrasion, and multiple sport applications. The foam pad offers additional cushion and prolongs  the life of the turf. Available for installation without glue or with Velcro seams.

How to Order
  • Buy online, Request a Quote, or call to place your order with a sales person
  • Synthetic Turf is priced by the square foot
  • Turf Rolls are 12' or 15' in width and cut to incrementally in length to the nearest foot
  • Minimum Order: 20' length (Shorter orders will not be accepted without calling in for authorization)
    Installation Options

    Kodiak Sports Installs Nationwide or we provide material for DIY

    Installation options

    • Full glue down
    • Seam only glue down
    • Seam only glue/seam tape
    • Factory Velcro seams
    Shipping Time

    The KS52N sports turf is one of our most popular items and is produced weekly. 

    Single and smaller roll orders can ship with in 4-5 days.

    Small orders of 2000-6000 sq. ft. will typically ship within 7-9 days

    Please allow 2.5 - 3 weeks for delivery of larger orders.
